title: Lebkuchen Christmas cookies
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '85g ground almonds', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 1/4 teaspoons cinnamon powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '175ml clear honey', '85g butter', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1/2 lemon, finely zested and juiced', '1/2 orange, finely zested', '100g icing sugar', '1 egg white, beaten']
